mapper.insert: INSERT INTO schedule (sNum, subject, sContent, sDay, eDay, sTime, eTime, sRegDate, color, cNum, userId) VALUES (schedule_seq.NEXTVAL, #{subject}, #{sContent}, #{sDay}, #{eDay, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{color}, #{cNum, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM schedule WHERE sNum = #{sNum} AND userId = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT sNum, subject, sContent, sDay, eDay, sTime, eTime, sRegDate, color, s.cNum, s.userId FROM schedule s LEFT OUTER JOIN schCategory sc ON s.cNum = sc.cNum WHERE sNum = #{sNum}
